release.action: Double signer now get a marking Union are now treeable, making it possible to connect unions (GR & GL)
Changes to CSA implementation.
Localization
Changes/Fixes to creditcard payments Black list added Fix to the unionhandicapreport
Updates to CSA implementation.
Creditcard payment in tournaments
Handicap report + login update (union required)
Added CSA correction calculation.
Added new block for setting club information
Reports for the guys at SYN
Club listener now check for /gr, /gkg etc uri, and redirects to the club page Added a few style classes to the edit startingtime list and printing startingtimes
Scorecard saving in tournaments now fixed incorrectly saved scorecard (I blame laddi) Viewing scorecards in resultviewer now displays scorecards with null date.. if the points are > 0.

Updated to version 3.1.4 of the Golf block... with the following changes Scorecard saving in tournaments now works properly Field startingtimes now saved correctly. Tournament Admin link now only show on tournaments 'owned' by the admin logged in.
Update to use version 3.1.3 of Golf block (which has POI version of two reports).
Update to use version 3.1.2 of Golf Login block.
Update to use version 3.1.2 of News block. Update to use version 3.1.3 of Category block.
Update to use version 3.1.4 of com.idega.block.ldap bundle for more printout when create userlogin fails
Update to use version 3.1.2 of Text block.
Update to use version 3.1.74 of eplatform that fixes Slide authentication issues.
Updated golf bundle to 3.1.2 to add GolfRegister servlet filter

Releasing golf application with tested cluster support.
com.idega.cluster version 3.1.0 and net.jxta version 1.0
code cleanup and update
GR handicap fix

Adding clustering support
